data.persona: We are so weary from the journey from Dubai. Yet here we are; in quarantine. So many people are here getting sick.
data.description:
You are in the sitting room.
the sitting room has a goat's skin as a sitting place in front of the cottage's fireplace that is just a fire burning in a pit. It is incredibly small
There's a stool, a firewood, a blanket, a plate, and a bed here.
The servant and the lady of the house are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the blanket so I can sit more comfortably.
data.mid_motivation: I will chat with the lady of the house to find out more about her life.
data.long_motivation: I will try to make time pass more quickly during the quarantine and avoid getting sick by getting to know the people in the house I am locked in.
